name: Strategic Orbital Fighting simulator
description:
This game was submited to the Weekly Jam 129 (Theme: lost in space)

Controls:

-Mouse left click: Spawn a black hole/ increase a black hole size.

-Mouse right click: Decrease a black hole size/ destroy black hole (if it is small).

Every time a player does something, their turn ends.

-------------------

Music: @Seanpruittmusic www.seanpruittmusic.com

Everything else: Culoextremo https://twitter.com/Elculoextremo
